pullrequest.title: Added gui-client-plugin option. Leave -g to load System Plugins (issue #2279)

content.raw:
If I understood right, this will be printed whether the user is trying to load a system or a gui plugin, right? Not sure if this is possible, but I think the ideal behaviour would be:

* Print error if user tried to load anything besides a `SystemPlugin` with -g
* Print error if user tried to load anything besides a `GUIPlugin` with --gui-client-plugin
* Don't print any warnings if user loads correct plugin type with correct flag
content.html:
If I understood right, this will be printed whether the user is trying to load a system or a gui plugin, right? Not sure if this is possible, but I think the ideal behaviour would be:

  • Print error if user tried to load anything besides a SystemPlugin with -g
  • Print error if user tried to load anything besides a GUIPlugin with --gui-client-plugin
  • Don't print any warnings if user loads correct plugin type with correct flag
